dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 714 IH: Feral Swine Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. De La Cruz (for herself, Mr. Tony Gonzales of Texas, Mr. Fallon, Mr. Pfluger, Ms. Crockett, Mr. McCaul, Mr. Jackson of Texas, Ms. Salazar, Mr. Sessions, Mr. Cuellar, Mr. Gooden of Texas, Mr. Ellzey, and Mr. Moore of Alabama) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018 to extend the feral swine eradication and control pilot program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Feral Swine Act.

section.header: Extension of feral swine eradication and control pilot program
section.text: Section 2408(g)(1) of the Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018 (7 U.S.C. 8351 note; Public Law 115â€“334) is amended by striking 2023 and inserting 2028.
